channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report X-2024030063
item.description:
Report X-2024030063

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-28
  • City: BRAINERD
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER NOTIFIED OF LEAK; PACKAGE PROGRESS STOPPED ON BELT. RESPONDER CLEARED AREA RESPONDER PICKED UP PACKAGE. TRANSPORTED IT TO DAMAGE AREA.

item.title: Report X-2024030031
item.description:
Report X-2024030031

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-26
  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS INFORMED THAT THERE WAS A STRONG CHEMICAL ODOR COMMING FROM SOME HAZMATS ON THE IRREG / HAZMAT UNLOAD ROLLERS. INSPECTING THE HAZMAT PACKAGES ON THE ROLLERS RESPONDER FOUND 1 WITH BOTH CLASS 5.1 AND 8 HAZARD DIAMONDS THAT SEEMED TO HAVE A STRONG ODOR BUT NO WET CORNERS ON THE BOX. OPENING THE BOX RESPONDER FOUND 4 1GAL CONTAINERS WITH VENTED CAPS AND LOOSE.

item.title: Report X-2024030014
item.description:
Report X-2024030014

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS INFORMED OF A POTENTIAL HAZMAT LEAKER ON THE UNLOAD IRREG BELT. ARRIVING RESPONDER WAS POINTED TOWARDS SEVERAL HAZMAT PACKAGES ON THE BELT AND WAS TOLD THERE WAS A STRONG CHEMICAL ODOR COMING FROM ONE OF THE PACKAGES. SORTING THROUGH THE PACKAGES RESPONDER FOUND THIS HAZMAT PACKAGE THAT HAD A STRONG ODOR COMING FROM IT. OPENING THE PACKAGE FOUND 4 1GAL CONTAINERS WITH VENTED CAPS AND UPON FORTHER INSPECTION FOUND ONE OF THE CAPS TO BE EXTREMELY LOOSE WHICH ALLOWED SOME OF THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT AND WET THE INTERNAL CARDBOARD LAYER.

item.title: Report X-2024021766
item.description:
Report X-2024021766

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: damaged package was discovered down by the loading dock. someone placed it in a lined tote and called for QA. QA brought it back to the damage area and began to inspect it for damage when the admin found that it contained undeclared hazardous material. the admin set it aside on the drain mats in the incoming damaged hazmat/LQ area. DescribePack: four bottles leaked due to loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in lined tote, moved to drain mats

item.title: Report X-2024021765
item.description:
Report X-2024021765

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: BRAINERD
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking on a delivery truck at 7:30 am and was removed from the delivery and was sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic pail inside the box had a very large crack on the left side of the plastic pail. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat was put in a Plastic lined bin to prevent further spillage.

item.title: Report X-2024021823
item.description:
Report X-2024021823

  • City: ROGERS

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Drum was discovered by driver on van leaking. QA was informed and drum was placed in a lined tote and brought to drain mats DescribePack: Cap came loose and contents spilled out DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA was informed and drum was placed in a lined tote and brought to drain mats
